answers.text:
Hi Wydale, 
Thank you for the interesting IT question! Unfortunately we do not have any literature yet about local governments adopting ITIL guidance and practices as it is usually used in private enterprise, although it is the standard there. 
Here is a link to ITIL’s website which has many very useful papers offering guidance and advice on how to make sure your adoption and usage is a success http://www.itil.org/en/vomkennen/itil/index.php ITIL has been around for over 20 years so there is a wealth of knowledge on their website.
I hope this helps answer your question, and any members with experience please chime in and share your thoughts on this set of IT practices
Best,
 Robin Saywitz
Knowledge Network Intern, ICMA
rsaywtiz@icma.org

text: Our IT department is adopting ITIL guidance and practices.  Has your organization adopted ITIL?  Would you please share your experience, successes and challenges?
title: ITIL Adoption
